【解析】  $\lim_{n\to \infty}(\sqrt{n^2 + n} -\sqrt{n^2 + 1})$
$$
\begin{array}{l} = \lim  _ {n \rightarrow \infty} \frac {n - 1}{\sqrt {n ^ {2} + n} + \sqrt {n ^ {2} + 1}} \\ = \lim  _ {n \rightarrow \infty} \frac {1 - \frac {1}{n}}{\sqrt {1 + \frac {1}{n}} + \sqrt {1 + \frac {1}{n ^ {2}}}} = \frac {1}{2} \\ \end{array}
$$

【解析】
$$
\begin{array}{l} \lim  _ {x \rightarrow 0} \frac {\int_ {0} ^ {x} \ln^ {2} (1 + t) d t}{x ^ {2}} = \lim  _ {x \rightarrow 0} \frac {\left(\int_ {0} ^ {x} \ln^ {2} (1 + t) d t\right) ^ {\prime}}{\left(x ^ {2}\right) ^ {\prime}} \\ = \lim  _ {x \rightarrow 0} \frac {\ln^ {2} (1 + x)}{2 x} = \lim  _ {x \rightarrow 0} \frac {\left(\ln^ {2} (1 + x)\right) ^ {\prime}}{\left(2 x\right) ^ {\prime}} \\ = \lim  _ {x \rightarrow 0} \frac {\frac {2 \ln (1 + x)}{1 + x}}{2} = 0 \\ \end{array}
$$

【解析】  $y' = \left(\arctan \sqrt{x^2 - 1}\right)' - \left(\frac{\ln x}{\sqrt{x^2 - 1}}\right)'.$
$$
\begin{array}{l} = \frac {1}{1 + x ^ {2} - 1} \left(\sqrt {x ^ {2} - 1}\right) ^ {\prime} - \frac {\frac {1}{x} \sqrt {x ^ {2} - 1} - \left(\sqrt {x ^ {2} - 1}\right) ^ {\prime} \ln x}{x ^ {2} - 1} \\ = \frac {2 x}{2 x ^ {2} \sqrt {x ^ {2} - 1}} - \frac {1}{x \sqrt {x ^ {2} - 1}} + \frac {\frac {2 x}{2 \sqrt {x ^ {2} - 1}} \ln x}{x ^ {2} - 1} \\ = \frac {x \ln x}{\left(x ^ {2} - 1\right) ^ {3 / 2}} \\ \end{array}
$$

【解析】解法一：设  $F(x,y) = \arctan{\frac{y}{x}} -\ln{\sqrt{x^2 + y^2}}$  ，则
$$
F _ {x} ^ {\prime} (x, y) = \frac {1}{1 + \left(\frac {y}{x}\right) ^ {2}} \left(- \frac {y}{x ^ {2}}\right) - \frac {1}{2} \frac {2 x}{x ^ {2} + y ^ {2}} = - \frac {x + y}{x ^ {2} + y ^ {2}}
$$
$$
\begin{array}{l} F _ {y} ^ {\prime} (x, y) = \frac {1}{1 + \left(\frac {y}{x}\right) ^ {2}} \left(\frac {1}{x}\right) - \frac {1}{2} \frac {2 y}{x ^ {2} + y ^ {2}} \\ = \frac {x - y}{x ^ {2} + y ^ {2}} \\ \end{array}
$$
故  $\frac{dy}{dx} = -\frac{F_x'(x,y)}{F_y'(x,y)}$
$$
= \frac {x + y}{x - y} (x \neq y)
$$
方法二：方程  $\arctan{\frac{y}{x}} = \ln{\sqrt{x^2 + y^2}}$  可写为  $\arctan{\frac{y}{x}} = \frac{1}{2}\ln (x^2 +y^2)$  视  $y = y(x)$  ，上式两边对  $x$  求导得
$$
\frac {1}{1 + \left(\frac {y}{x}\right) ^ {2}} \cdot \frac {x y ^ {\prime} - y}{x ^ {2}} = \frac {1}{2} \cdot \frac {2 x + 2 y y ^ {\prime}}{x ^ {2} + y ^ {2}},
$$
即  $\frac{xy' - y}{x^2 + y^2} = \frac{x + yy'}{x^2 + y^2}$
所以  $y^\prime (x - y) = x + y$  ，推出  $\frac{dy}{dx} = y' = \frac{x + y}{x - y}\quad (x\neq y)$

$$
\begin{array}{l} = \lim  _ {n \rightarrow \infty} \ln (1 + \frac {1}{2 n}) ^ {n} \\ = \lim  _ {n \rightarrow \infty} \ln [ (1 + \frac {1}{2 n}) ^ {2 n} ] ^ {\frac {1}{2}} \\ = \ln e ^ {\frac {1}{2}} \\ = \frac {1}{2} \\ \end{array}
$$
方法二：  $\lim_{n\to \infty}n\left\{(\ln (2 + \frac{1}{n}) - \ln 2\right\} = \lim_{n\to \infty}\frac{\ln(2 + \frac{1}{n}) - \ln 2}{\frac{1}{n}}$
$$
\begin{array}{l} = (\ln x) ^ {\prime} \Big | _ {x = 2} \\ = \left. \frac {1}{x} \right| _ {x = 2} = \frac {1}{2} \\ \end{array}
$$
方法三：  $\lim_{n\to \infty}n\left\{(\ln (2 + \frac{1}{n}) - \ln 2\right\} = \lim_{n\to \infty}x\left\{\ln (2 + \frac{1}{x}) - \ln 2\right\}$
$$
\begin{array}{l} = \lim  _ {n \to \infty} \frac {\ln (2 + \frac {1}{x}) - \ln 2}{\frac {1}{x}} \\ \frac {1}{(2 + \frac {1}{-})} \cdot \left(- \frac {1}{x ^ {2}}\right) \\ = \lim  _ {n \rightarrow \infty} \frac {x}{- \frac {1}{x ^ {2}}} \\ = \lim  _ {n \rightarrow \infty} \frac {1}{2 + \frac {1}{x}} \\ = \frac {1}{2} \\ \end{array}
$$

$$

$$

$$

$$
则  $y^\prime (x^2 +y^2 -y) = x$

\therefore \frac {d y}{d x} = y ^ {\prime} = \frac {x}{x ^ {2} + y ^ {2} - y} = \frac {x}{e ^ {2 y} - y}
$$
$$

$$

$$

$$
$$
\therefore \frac {d y}{d x} = - \frac {F _ {x} ^ {\prime}}{F _ {y} ^ {\prime}} = - \frac {- \frac {x}{\sqrt {x ^ {2} + y ^ {2}}}}{e ^ {y} - \frac {y}{\sqrt {x ^ {2} + y ^ {2}}}} = \frac {x}{e ^ {y} \sqrt {x ^ {2} + y ^ {2}} - y} = \frac {x}{e ^ {2 y} - y}
$$
$$
\therefore \frac {d y}{d x} \Bigg | _ {\substack {y = 0 \\ x = 1}} = 1.
$$

$$
$$
= x - \frac {1}{2} + C e ^ {- 2 x}

【解析】（1）  $f(x) = (1 + \frac{1}{x})^x$  两边取对数得
$$
\ln f (x) = x \ln \left(1 + \frac {1}{x}\right),
$$
两边对  $x$  求导数得
$$
\frac {1}{f (x)} \cdot f ^ {\prime} (x) = \ln \left(1 + \frac {1}{x}\right) - \frac {1}{1 + x},
$$
则  $f^{\prime}(x) = \left(1 + \frac{1}{x}\right)^{x}\left[\ln \left(1 + \frac{1}{x}\right) - \frac{1}{1 + x}\right].$
（2）（证法一）当  $x > 0$  时，
记  $g(x) = \ln x$  ，在  $\left[1,1 + \frac{1}{x}\right]$  上应用拉格朗日中值定理得
$$
g \left(1 + \frac {1}{x}\right) - g (1) = g ^ {\prime} (\xi) \cdot \frac {1}{x}, \left(1 <   \xi <   1 + \frac {1}{x}\right)
$$
即  $\ln \left(1 + \frac{1}{x}\right) = \frac{1}{\xi} \cdot \frac{1}{x} > \frac{1}{1 + \frac{1}{x}} \cdot \frac{1}{x} = \frac{1}{1 + x} \Rightarrow \ln \left(1 + \frac{1}{x}\right) - \frac{1}{1 + x} > 0,$
于是  $f^{\prime}(x) = \left(1 + \frac{1}{x}\right)^{x}\left[\ln \left(1 + \frac{1}{x}\right) - \frac{1}{1 + x}\right] > 0,$
故当  $x > 0$  时， $f(x)$  单调增加
（证法二）当  $x > 0$  时，记  $\varphi (x) = \ln \left(1 + \frac{1}{x}\right) - \frac{1}{1 + x},$
则  $\phi'(x) = \frac{-1}{x(1 + x)} + \frac{1}{(1 + x)^2} = \frac{-1}{x(1 + x)^2} < 0$
所以  $\varphi (x)$  在  $(0, + \infty)$  内单调下降
又  $\lim_{x\to +\infty}\varphi (x) = \lim_{x\to +\infty}\left[\ln \left(1 + \frac{1}{x}\right) - 1 + \frac{1}{x}\right] = 0$
$\therefore$  当  $x > 0$  时，  $\varphi (x) > 0$  ，于是  $f^{\prime}(x) = \left(1 + \frac{1}{x}\right)^{x}\phi (x) > 0$
故当  $x > 0$  时， $f(x)$  单调增加.

在  $x = 0$  的左、右邻域内， $f''(x)$  异号，
点  $\left(0, \frac{a}{2}\right)$  为曲线的拐点.
（3）因为当  $b > 0$  时，  $\lim_{t\to +\infty}f(x) = \lim_{t\to +\infty}\frac{a}{1 + e^{bx}} = 0,$
$$
\lim  _ {x \rightarrow - \infty} f (x) = \lim  _ {x \rightarrow - \infty} \frac {a}{1 + e ^ {b x}} = a;
$$
当  $b < 0$  时，  $\lim_{x\to +\infty}f(x) = \lim_{x\to +\infty}\frac{a}{1 + e^{bx}} = a,$
$$

$$
所以，  $y = f(x)$  的水平渐近线方程为  $y = 0$  和  $y = a$

当  $f_{z}\neq 0$  时，  $\frac{\partial z}{\partial x} = -\frac{f_x}{f_z} = \frac{z}{ye^{yz} - x},\frac{\partial z}{\partial y} = -\frac{f_y}{f_z} = \frac{-ze^{yz}}{ye^{yz} - x},$
所以  $\frac{\partial z}{\partial x} + \frac{\partial z}{\partial y} = \frac{z - z e^{yz}}{ye^{yz} - x} = \frac{z - z(1 + xz)}{ye^{yz} - x} = \frac{xz^2}{x - ye^{yz}}.$

$$

$$

又  $\lim_{n\to \infty}\frac{v_{n + 1}}{v_n} = \lim_{n\to \infty}\frac{(n + 1)^2\cdot 2^n}{2^{n + 1}\cdot n^2} = \lim_{n\to \infty}\frac{(n + 1)^2}{2n^2} = \frac{1}{2} < 1,$  ，由比值审敛法可知  $\sum_{n = 1}^{\infty}\frac{n^2}{2^n}$  收敛，因为  $u_{n}\leqslant \frac{n^{2}}{2^{n}}$  ，则由正项级数的比较审敛法可知  $\sum_{n = 1}^{\infty}u_{n}$  收敛.

【证明】（1）设  $f(x) = \arctan x + \arctan \frac{1}{x} -\frac{\pi}{2},$
$$
f ^ {\prime} (x) = \frac {1}{1 + x ^ {2}} + \frac {1}{1 + \frac {1}{x ^ {2}}} \cdot \left(- \frac {1}{x ^ {2}}\right) - 0 = \frac {1}{1 + x ^ {2}} - \frac {1}{1 + x ^ {2}} = 0,
$$
则  $f(x)$  在  $(0, +\infty)$  内是一个常数，令  $x = 1$  ，得  $f(1) = \frac{\pi}{4} + \frac{\pi}{4} - \frac{\pi}{2} = 0$  ，即  $f(x) = 0$  故当  $x > 0$  时，  $\arctan x = \frac{\pi}{2} - \arctan \frac{1}{x}$
(2) 设  $g(x) = \ln (x + \sqrt{1 + x^2}) - \arctan x, x \geqslant 0$ ，则
$$
\begin{array}{l} g ^ {\prime} (x) = \frac {1}{x + \sqrt {1 + x ^ {2}}} \cdot (x + \sqrt {1 + x ^ {2}}) ^ {\prime} - \frac {1}{1 + x ^ {2}} \\ = \frac {1}{x + \sqrt {1 + x ^ {2}}} \cdot \left(1 + \frac {x}{\sqrt {1 + x ^ {2}}}\right) - \frac {1}{1 + x ^ {2}} \\ = \frac {1}{x + \sqrt {1 + x ^ {2}}} \cdot \frac {x + \sqrt {1 + x ^ {2}}}{\sqrt {1 + x ^ {2}}} - \frac {1}{1 + x ^ {2}} = \frac {\sqrt {1 + x ^ {2}} - 1}{1 + x ^ {2}}, \\ \end{array}
$$
当  $x > 0$  时， $g'(x) > 0$ ，则  $g(x)$  是  $[0, +\infty)$  上的单调递增函数，
故当  $x > 0$  时， $g(x) > g(0) = 0$ ，即  $\arctan x < \ln (x + \sqrt{1 + x^2})$ .

【精析】（1）由题意可知  $\int_0^t [f(x) - \sqrt{1 + x^4} ]\mathrm{d}x = t^3$
等式两边对  $t$  求导得  $f(t) - \sqrt{1 + t^4} = 3t^2$
则  $f(t) = 3t^2 + \sqrt{1 + t^4}$ ，即  $f(x) = 3x^2 + \sqrt{1 + x^4}$
(2) 由  $f(x)g'(x) + f'(x)g(x) = 5x\sqrt{x}$  知  $[f(x)g(x)]' = 5x\sqrt{x}$ ,
故  $f(x)g(x) = \int 5x\sqrt{x}\mathrm{d}x$
得  $f(x)g(x) = 2x^{\frac{5}{2}} + C$  ，则  $g(x) = \frac{2x^{\frac{5}{2}} + C}{3x^{2} + \sqrt{1 + x^{4}}} = \frac{2x^{2}\sqrt{x} + C}{3x^{2} + \sqrt{1 + x^{4}}}$
又  $g(0) = 1$  ，解得  $C = 1$  ，故  $g(x) = \frac{2x^2\sqrt{x} + 1}{3x^2 + \sqrt{1 + x^4}}.$
